title: CONFUSE DROPPER
briefDescription: The CONFUSE DROPPER map is a Minecraft Bedrock Realms minigame CREATED BY DZER0, FIZUKI. CONFUSE DROPPER is very similar to normal dropper maps but with ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
The CONFUSE DROPPER map is a Minecraft Bedrock Realms minigame CREATED BY DZER0, FIZUKI. CONFUSE DROPPER is very similar to normal dropper maps but with a small twist. All of the levels in this map are designed to make you confused as a player you have steer clear of the obstacles to get to the bottom. It has 10 fun and creative different levels that can be played by yourself or with your friends. Some levels were made easier and a mode was added to help most people who struggled with dropper maps.
CREATED BY DZER0, FIZUKI
This is a fun dropper map for 1.13 and all further versions
It has 10 fun and creative different levels.
If you decide to download this map and give it a try, good luck!
Rules:
? Render Distance 8+
? FoV: 75
? Don?t Cheat
? Made for 1-2 players
Updates:
? Updated to Minecraft 1.13.1.

French Slap is a game like Cookie Slap; the goal is to knock all the players off the arena, last player alive wins, but this map is in a ?typically-French? theme!
French Slap is a game where the goal is to knock the players off the map. Last player alive wins! But this map is in a ?typically-French? theme/style, and with little twists!

title: Working Plague Inc. inside of Minecraft Bedrock
briefDescription: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to play Plague inc. inside of Minecraft? Well, now you can experience just that! This map ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to play Plague inc. inside of Minecraft? Well, now you can experience just that! This map is pretty much exactly like the game, complete with multiple upgrades as well as having to infect, and kill the human race
If you have never played the game, fear not because the map comes with a book that will teach you all you need to know about the game

title: Beyond the Portal (Find the Button) [HUGE UPDATE!]
briefDescription: This is the Beyond the Portal: Find the Buttonby alienboyThis is a find the button map which celebrates the release of the all new 1.16 Nether ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This is the Beyond the Portal: Find the Button
by alienboy
This is a find the button map which celebrates the release of the all new 1.16 Nether Update that launched earlier this June!

The map currently consists of 10 stages with a goal of 100 stages in it?s final update! But that as I?m sure you can guess is quite the distance away and will take a lot of work.
It?s because of this that any and all suggestions for stages are very much appreciated and any that make it into an update of this map will be credited so get commenting!
Updates will be frequent so stay tuned!
INTRODUCING: TROPHIES (WITH CUSTOM TEXTURES) and the OFFICIAL finished first 10 stage release!

Stages currently in-game include:
1. The Beginning of the End
2. Infected Forest
3. A Time Before Change
4. A Slow Souly Demise
5. The Not Cobble Nether Bridges
6. The Ne-end-er Glitch
7. Ancient Debris Mines
8. The Fungi Sanctuary
9. Basalt Delta Royalty
10. Strider Stables
With more coming very soon!
Should I make a guide video to this map?

title: The Cube PARKOUR ? Bedrock
briefDescription: A challenging, multiplayer OR single-player, PARKOUR map made for Bedrock with 24 increasingly difficult levels! The map also uses our own custom texture pack! Can you ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
A challenging, multiplayer OR single-player, PARKOUR map made for Bedrock with 24 increasingly difficult levels! The map also uses our own custom texture pack! Can you reach the top of The Cube?
The Cube Parkour map has very simplistic and clean levels designed to test players? skills and challenge even the best parkour masters!

There are 8 parkour stages per floor of The Cube, the very beginning is setup for low level players; jumping further through each floor, you?ll come across increasingly difficult stages.
Any player can make as much progress towards the end as they can, and as fast as they can! Allowing for an intense race to reach the end if playing with friends!

title: First To The Top!
briefDescription: First to the top is a minigame where you have to build until the top of a tower, before other players do it. You can ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
First to the top is a minigame where you have to build until the top of a tower, before other players do it. You can disturb them by shooting at them with a bow, catching with a fishing rod or just hurting them with a sword.
There is a lobby where players can wait for the next game. You can win prizes by completing the maze or the parkour. When you win, you receive 10 xp levels. With these levels you can buy power-ups. Once you came to the top, you have to find the right button and push it to win, but the right button changes every 10 seconds.
At the start of the game, you receive a wooden sword, scissors, a bow with 64 arrows, a fishing rod and 3 stacks of wool.
Good luck and have fun!
Lobby;
Shop:
Gameplay;

title: UltraCraft Original
briefDescription: Hello, everyone, and welcome to our Original version! As some of you may know already, We made a winters version first. UltraCraft Original was already ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to our Original version! As some of you may know already, We made a winters version first. UltraCraft Original was already made before the winter version. We used the original and put snow in every spot we could. However; silly me had to accidentally delete UltraCraft original, wich meant that we had to start all over again on this, but we made it out alive, and I hope ya?ll enjoy it!

Explore games such as Capture the Flag. Join in epic races against your friends! This game is still in Beta, and we are soon to add more mingames and activities to the game soon! Feel free to give us any reviews or suggestions for our next update!

title: ArborCraft Games, Unique and Groundbreaking Minigames!
briefDescription: ArborCraft games is a collection of three amazing and unique games to play with your friends, all in one world! Have tons of fun in ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
ArborCraft games is a collection of three amazing and unique games to play with your friends, all in one world! Have tons of fun in this unique minigame collection with no mods or addons! only command blocks!
ArborCraft games is a collection of three unique and fun PvP games, CampWars, WoolWars, and SkyWars, with beatiful unique lobbies and maps for all three and a wonderful themed main lobby.
ESBE 2G shader by McbeEringi used for all screenshots.

But most of us probably care more about the gameplay, Let?s start with CampWars!
Campwars is a pvp game that supports four teams and as many players as you want! I recommend 2-4 players, but you can have as many as you want! Before each match click reset, then choose your team. You will be dropped into a beautiful, huge wilderness map with two structures in the middle and refilling chests around the map with random refills
The map is perfect for a large player count and small player count, it works with as low as 2 players or as high as 30 and versatile enough to accommodate all kinds of different play-styles!
you will spawn next to a campfire. you can?t place or break blocks, so defend it best you can from enemy splash bottles!

This rustic shop sells valuable gear to give you an edge! around the map you will find chests, which will refill with random items every few moments. inside you may find leather. put five leather in the top left barrel slot in the barrel above the item you want and exit the barrel. then the item will be given to you. you just bought something! The shop is the only way for you to obtain a splash bottle, which, if thrown right in an enemy campfire, will extinguish it and stop them from respawning!

The wizards tower is another shop that deals in nether stars found in comets. These comets fall from the sky into specific locations and contain nether stars. you can buy magic items there, such as cow spawners to farm leather, health boosts, elytras, ender pearls, a gust of wind that launches you into the air, and more!

They can be found in out of the way places, such as underwater, in forest clearings, or in caves?
Comets fall from the sky, periodically, and contain nether stars
to eliminate a team, throw a splash water bottle at their campfire then kill them.
be the last team standing!
Remember to turn off in game player names so you can?t see your enemies gamertags through walls!
Woolwars:

Woolwars is a strategic fast paced pvp game!
when you start a game of woolwars, you will be given levitation and slowfalling, giving you a chance to land on the lower islands. or, you can stay at the bottom and jump on pressure plates to get food, wool, and ladders. each island contains loot to help you be the winner! Last one standing wins!

woolwars takes place in a beautiful sci-fi themed map!
Skywars:
This is not your normal skywars! this skywars allows you to craft whatever, build whatever, start wherever, and fight over items that when put into your generator, give you iron and gold!

when you begin, you will start high above the center and be given slow falling. while falling through the air, fight to be on one of the four generator islands! once the effect wears off, those surviving can access the generator barrels. the generators regularly spawn wood when not boosted, which you can use to craft whatever you want! the center island holds a conduit, which when placed on top of the top hopper of your generator, will boost it to generate diamonds at a slow rate, which can be crafted. the four stone structures contain end rods, which when placed on top of the side hoppers will generate iron into the barrel.
Use these resources to craft armor, weapons, tools, and fortifications.

title: VoidMC: Hide & Seek | NetherUpdate
briefDescription: Hey you! Yeah you!Want to play the newest NetherUpdate?Why not explore it in Hide & Seek Style! Today we made a map.Featuring ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Hey you! Yeah you!
Want to play the newest NetherUpdate?
Why not explore it in Hide & Seek Style! Today we made a map.
Featuring Hide and Seek but 1.16 Edition! It Includes Many features!
There are many god spots hidden in the map!
HOW TO PLAY?
Hiders:
Hide from the seeker until the game ends! You can buy
taunts! It will make some noise to the seeker!
Seekers:
Explore the map and hunt the remaining hiders!
You must look for god spots to find those pesky hiders!
FEATURES
SEEKER CHOSER:

Tell the person who you want to be the seeker to press Team Seeker button. This will automatically make them the seeker.
GOD SPOTS:

Use the wines to climb up to more god spots!
TAUNT SHOP:

All hiders will get 5 gold to buy taunts. Just insert it in the barrels!
BIOMES:
WARPED FOREST

title: A Little Simple Spleef Game
briefDescription: Just a little, simple Spleef game. Spleef is a game where you need to break the block under the other players to make them fall ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Just a little, simple Spleef game. Spleef is a game where you need to break the block under the other players to make them fall into the void and die. This map contains 2 different arenas and 2 gamemodes. 1 arena has 3 layers and the other 2 layers!
Just a little, simple Spleef game. This map contains 2 arenas; the first with 2 layers and the second with 3 layers, and 2 gamemodes (Classic Spleef & Snowball Spleef).
Your goal is to break the block under the other players to make them fall. At the final layer they will fall to the void and die! Last player alive wins.
-Classic Spleef:
Normal Spleef.
-Snowball Spleef:
In this gamemode you will have 1 snowball for every block you break. You can throw the snowballs to hit other players.
? WARNING: For the Snowball Spleef gamemode to work correctly, your language needs to be set to French or English. ?

title: Strider Racing
briefDescription: In this map, you saddle up on Striders and race to the end of an obstacle course! Your goal is to be the first one ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
In this map, you saddle up on Striders and race to the end of an obstacle course! Your goal is to be the first one to the end! This map was created by ThanPixel and Nukejolt, with help from Arthur78234 and BlueSlimeMC. If you are using this map for a YouTube video, please credit the creators! Have fun, and may the best racer win! ?
To start the map, each player must press the start button in the lobby. Each player chooses a side, and presses the spawn strider button. Once each player is ready, the player on the left presses the start button, and you?re off!
This map uses Keyyard?s Floating Texts Addon. Special thanks to them for providing that addon! ?

title: Map Jam for Racial Justice
briefDescription: This map was created in 72 hours to raise funds for the NAACP LDF: https://www.naacpldf.org/It is a "Tower Defence" minigame map where ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
This map was created in 72 hours to raise funds for the NAACP LDF: https://www.naacpldf.org/
It is a ?Tower Defence? minigame map where you defend a homebaked pie from wild animals.
Use snacks dropped from wild animals to buy turrets and items. Survive endless waves of animals and see what high score you can reach!

This Minecraft minigame map was created in 72 hours for a charity Map Jam.
It is a ?Tower Defence? minigame map where you defend a homebaked pie from wild animals. Use snacks dropped from wild animals to buy turrets and items. Survive endless waves of animals and see what high score you can reach!
P.S. This map is not super polished/balanced and is provided ?as is? for the Minecraft community to see what is achievable to create in 3 days. We may release a more polished/balanced version of this map in the future.
Throughout the 3 days, we accepted donations to raise money for the NAACP LDF: https://www.naacpldf.org/
We raised a grand total of $950 thanks to the following donators:
MCPEDL, MineyCow, JannisX11, LegendaryAced, 0gKevo, Powerdragon, (and of course VanillaBurp and samasaurus6)

title: Bomberman [Minigame]
briefDescription: Bomberman is a classic arcade game where you blow up walls to access rooms to blow up your opponents. In this minecraft map, play with ...

crawledImageUrls.text: Bomberman is a classic arcade game where you blow up walls to access rooms to blow up your opponents. In this minecraft map, play with up to 4 players. There?s even a ceremony at the end! All rules are in the map! Happy minecrafting!

title: Half-a-Heart Run v2
briefDescription: INTRODUCTION Half-a-Heart Run v.2 is a fun race course, BUT YOU ONLY HAVE HALF A HEART! This map has courses that will make you take ...

crawledImageUrls.text:
Half-a-Heart Run v.2 is a fun race course, BUT YOU ONLY HAVE HALF A HEART! This map has courses that will make you take your time. Why take my time? BECAUSE YOU HAVE HAVE HALF A HEART >:D This takes the courses from the original makes them bigger and better. This map will put up a challenge. You will have to locate where to fall, have patience and time your jumps, or else you will fail!! The only advice I can give you is good luck
There are 4 courses that you have to finish in order to win, Grass Lands, Desert, Dungeon, Ocean. All of these courses use unique ways to put your skill to the test.
